review: Easy to use, and the native YouTube channel is way better than on my Apple TV. Missing Spotify only!
author: Tyron

review: Love our chromecast! Use it almost everyday and now we're no longer paying for cable.
author: Laura McClintock

review: Luv itGreat picture resolutionFun watching you tube
author: Phil Phillips

review: It's working very good and delivered at the expected time also.But, this version doesn't work unless it's pluged to electric source, My sis bought one two months ago  and it works directly just by connecting it to the USB port in the same TV , it's much better than this one.
author: Tareq
